content: celestial baby blanket @jaden thee crochetstress materials notes yarn - as advised by the american academy - premier yarns bamboo fair in naval ~200 of pediatrics babies under 12 months grams azure ~500 grams and daffodil old should not be left unsupervised ~50 grams cotton sprout speckles in with any loose materials this includes camping ~50 grams - double stranded for this project double blankets safety first weight 3 yarn or weight 4 yarn should work hook - 6mm/j crochet hook gauge - 12 single crochets x 10 row = 4 inches x 2 5 inches - i have tight gauge so you may have to size your hook down to meet my gauge - results in 31 5 inches x 39 5 inches blanket pattern - base pattern was found online i couldn t find the creator if you know them please email me - colorwork technique needed check out this video from willow crochet for a quick how-to original alpha graph - i added 100% cotton fabric to the back to cover the yarn carried over you contact could make the pattern twice or a solid color for the back instagram @jaden thee crochetstress - start with chain 91 then work towards email jaden thee crochetstress@gmail com the full pattern chain 1 and turn at each row - stitch fiddle link available to download and edit if making edits make sure that wherever you add the stars that they start on the same type of line that the original pattern does even or odd
